extendedIngredients.name: cream cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: Garnish: Shredded Cheese and Sour Cream

extendedIngredients.name: kidney beans
extendedIngredients.originalString: 15 oz Can Kidney Beans- Drained and Rinsed

extendedIngredients.name: tomato sauce
extendedIngredients.originalString: 8 oz Carrot Puree or Tomato Sauce

recipes.title: Slow Cooker Beefy Taco Soup

winePairing.pairingText: Pinot Noir, Riesling, and Sparkling rosé are great choices for Mexican. Acidic white wines like riesling or low-tannin reds like pinot noir can work well with Mexican dishes. Sparkling rosé is a safe pairing too. One wine you could try is MacMurray Ranch Russian River Pinot Noir. It has 4 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 24 dollars.

productMatches.title: MacMurray Ranch Russian River Pinot Noir
productMatches.description: Our MacMurray Ranch 2012 Russian River Valley Pinot Noir opens with aromas of lavender and boysenberry that give way to flavors of dark cherry and pomegranate. This luscious wine has a silky mouthfeel, framed by subtle hints of oak from barrel aging.

recipes.instructions: Combine ingredients in a 4 quart slow cooker.Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours.Serve with shredded cheese and sour cream

steps.step: Combine ingredients in a 4 quart slow cooker.Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours.
Serve with shredded cheese and sour cream
